author: schor
msg: uima-3 and uima-5 docbook reorg - workaround for inconsistent
support of xi:include with nested directories by putting
everything into a flat directory, and changing FAQs to
not use qandaset because FOP fails if the answers are too
long, giving an erroneous error message about a duplicate id
when in fact there is no duplicate.
